Patches

If you are a developer/contributor and already have an improvement ready for Notepad++, you can submit a patch using the patch tracker (http://sourceforge.net/tracker2/?group_id=95717&atid=612384). This is the great part of Open Source, you can add some stuff in as well :)

Feedback

If you experience a bug or would like to see an addition on the current page, feel free to leave us a message.
